Package core.modAPI

Interface Button

  • public interface Button
    A button for the main menu, just to the left of the temperature bar and underneath the creature rankings
    Author:
    clay

    • Method Detail

      • click

        void click​(int relX,
           int relY)
        Called when this button is clicked
        Parameters:
        relX - the location of the click relative to the top left corner of the button
        relY - the location of the click relative to the top left corner of the button

      • getText

        java.lang.String getText()
        Called by Board.drawUI()
        Returns:
        the string that will be drawn on the top half of the button

      • getSecondLineText

        java.lang.String getSecondLineText()
        Called by Board.drawUI()
        Returns:
        the string that will be drawn on the bottom half of the button

      • getFlashAlpha

        float getFlashAlpha()
        if your button flashes, this will control that. You are responsible for dimming the flash over time
        Returns:
        the current intensity of the flash

      • init

        void init()
